page.title: 04Marton Residents,Interview
page.content: On Tuesday we interviewed a lady.The lady doesn't like the village as much now as she did when she was a child.She used to go to the village school and all her three children went there.It closed down 12 years ago.She hasn't a car but her husband has one.She uses the bus a lot.When the railway was in use she found that a great help.Some of the houses have been modernised and she has watched Marton grow.Two of her children live in Marton still.She thinks that the village is not a proper community now because of the new people.Most of her friends live in the village.As a child she could relate the names of all the villagers but now she couldn't name above half the residents.
